original_text: And, behold, there was a great earthquake: for the angel of the Lord descended from heaven, and came and rolled back the stone from the door, and sat upon it.
korean_text: 큰 지진이 나며 주의 천사가 하늘로부터 내려와 돌을 굴려 내고 그 위에 앉았는데

sentences.original_text: And, behold, there was a great earthquake
for the angel of the Lord descended from heaven
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 주의 천사가 하늘에서 내려왔기 때문이다

sentences.original_text: and came and rolled back the stone from the door
